channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Martínez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: The political implications of the Supreme Court's ruling on Trump's tariffs
item.description: The Supreme Court has found some of President Trump's tariffs to be illegal. What are the political implications?
item.content:encoded: The Supreme Court has found some of President Trump's tariffs to be illegal. What are the political implications?
item.dc:creator: Mara Liasson

item.title: Lawyer in SCOTUS case against Trump's tariffs says his clients want a refund
item.description: Neal Katyal, one of the lawyers who defended U.S. businesses in the SCOTUS case against Trump's tariffs, argues that the federal government must refund them with interest.
item.content:encoded:
Neal Katyal, one of the lawyers who defended U.S. businesses in the SCOTUS case against Trump's tariffs, argues that the federal government must refund them with interest.

(Image credit: Drew Angerer/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Armed man shot and killed at Mar-a-Lago Sunday
item.description: An armed man was shot and killed at Mar-a-Lago on Sunday. President Trump was in Washington, D.C., at the time.
item.content:encoded: An armed man was shot and killed at Mar-a-Lago on Sunday. President Trump was in Washington, D.C., at the time.
item.dc:creator: Luke Garrett

item.title: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul talks about the major winter storm slamming the state
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep talks with New York's Democratic Gov. Kathy Hochul about the effects of a powerful nor'easter that prompted multiple declarations of states of emergency.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep talks with New York's Democratic Gov. Kathy Hochul about the effects of a powerful nor'easter that prompted multiple declarations of states of emergency.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Influencers are promoting peptides for better health. What does the science say?
item.description: The latest wellness craze involves injecting these molecules for athletic performance, longevity and more. Scientists say the research isn't keeping pace with the health claims.
item.content:encoded: The latest wellness craze involves injecting these molecules for athletic performance, longevity and more. Scientists say the research isn't keeping pace with the health claims.
item.dc:creator: Sarah Boden

item.title: Poll: Most say the state of the union is not strong and the U.S. is worse off
item.description: Ahead of the State of the Union address on Tuesday, evidence continues to mount that President Trump is facing political headwinds.
item.content:encoded:
Ahead of the State of the Union address on Tuesday, evidence continues to mount that President Trump is facing political headwinds.

(Image credit: Alex Wong)
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: The political implications of the SCOTUS ruling on Trump's tariffs, China urges Washington to lift tariffs after SCOTUS decision, new poll reveals what Americans think of the state of the union.
item.content:encoded: The political implications of the SCOTUS ruling on Trump's tariffs, China urges Washington to lift tariffs after SCOTUS decision, new poll reveals what Americans think of the state of the union.
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Tracy Morgan plays a disgraced football player rehabilitating his image in new sitcom
item.description: Robert Carlock, The co-showrunner of "30 Rock," teams up with Tracy Morgan again for "The Fall and Rise of Reggie Dinkins," a new sitcom about a disgraced football player rehabilitating his image.
item.content:encoded: Robert Carlock, The co-showrunner of "30 Rock," teams up with Tracy Morgan again for "The Fall and Rise of Reggie Dinkins," a new sitcom about a disgraced football player rehabilitating his image.
item.dc:creator: Michel Martin

item.title: Death of Mexican cartel leader sparks widespread violence across Mexico
item.description: One of the world's most wanted drug traffickers -- a Mexican cartel boss known as "El Mencho" -- was killed by Mexican security forces. After his death, widespread violence erupted across Mexico.
item.content:encoded: One of the world's most wanted drug traffickers -- a Mexican cartel boss known as "El Mencho" -- was killed by Mexican security forces. After his death, widespread violence erupted across Mexico.
item.dc:creator: Eyder Peralta

item.title: Brits question whether age of deference is over after ex-Prince Andrew's arrest
item.description: After the arrest of the former Prince Andrew, British institutions from the media to Parliament are asking whether they should have scrutinized the royals more. Is an age of deference now over?
item.content:encoded: After the arrest of the former Prince Andrew, British institutions from the media to Parliament are asking whether they should have scrutinized the royals more. Is an age of deference now over?
item.dc:creator: Lauren Frayer
